PRIVATE MESSAGE

Hi John,

I am hoping to make video tutorials about developing with Microsoft Access for Pluralsight. I spoke with Nathan Granitz and he recommended I watch some of your video tutorials, which I have. I can only hope to be as good as you someday! Anyway, I am making my tryout video today and do not have the audition kit. I’ve written a script, an outline, and have everything setup to record with Camtasia. Don’t want to lose my momentum.

I saw the PDF file that Nathan sent me had links and, unfortunately, did not attempt to download them sooner. Today, I click on links and only see they point to files on MY drive that I do not have :( Would it be possible for you to send me the audition kit? Specifically, I need the fonts and the PowerPoint template.

I am doing my tryout video on a tool I built with Access to make caption files for videos (which Pluralsight does support – just not many authors do it since they don’t know that) … maybe Pluralsight will make this video available for other authors too :)

btw, I have been making videos for 5 years and have 2 YouTube channels:

www.YouTube.com/LearnAccessByCrystal (Access, Excel, Word, and PowerPoint videos) www.YouTube.com/LearnByCrystal (Windows and Windows Phone development videos)

thank you, John

Warm Regards, Crystal Microsoft MVP, Access strive4peace2010@yahoo.com
